title: Is there any limit on the number of supplemental essays I need to write to universities on the common app? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is there any limit on the number of supplemental essays I need to write to universities on the common app? https://appsupport.commonapp.org/applicantsupport/s/article/How-can-I-view-a-college-s-Writing-Supplement-if-they-have-one YES. You have to follow the guidelines / requirements for your college, as recommended by them. Some colleges do not have this required and most of elite colleges require.
